description.displayText: My girls love Armonie! They ask me to make plans so she can come over. She plays very well with them and drives them to activities.  She was always early, never cancelled and was available for last minute needs very often. I would keep her forever but we didn't have as many activities and outings down the line.
description.originalText: My girls love Armonie! They ask me to make plans so she can come over. She plays very well with them and drives them to activities.  She was always early, never cancelled and was available for last minute needs very often. I would keep her forever but we didn't have as many activities and outings down the line.

description.displayText: Armonie was extremely warm and excited during our phone conversation. She seemed like a very amazing person and we were very excited to meet her in person because she was so enthusiastic. An in-person interview/meet up was scheduled for the same week and Armonie confirmed. When it came time for the in- person meet up, Armonie never showed or called. I waited over 30 minutes and still no Armonie. Even after the no call/no show, Armonie never reached out to explain what happened. It is very unfortunate as she seemed like she had great potential.
